name: Murloc RPG (FroggitChef)
description:
Features:

- 6 murloc characters with unique personalities and abilities that are reminiscent to their effects i nhearthstone

- 1 amazingly put together dungeon with many dangerous enemies and a familiar face who is no longe in charge...

- 1 another amazingly put together dungeon but sadly unfinished - crafting system that allows you to choose how you want the game to be played!

- cool secrets - actually dildos???
